purpose: The email invites colleagues to apply for Europe's only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025), emphasizing the opportunity to enhance expertise in the field. It highlights the program's offerings, including expert-led lectures, collaborative discussions, and networking opportunities. Applications are open until July 11th or until all spots are filled.
evidence_sentences: Join Europe's Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025)!
Applications remain open until July 11th or until all spots are filled.
SCHIER 2025 offers a week of: Expert-led lectures and interactive sessions on key topics and methodologies.
Collaborative discussions on emerging research challenges.
Networking opportunities that foster meaningful, long-term collaboration and advancement.
